data.name: Gitcoin
data.description: Gitcoin creates solutions that empower digitally native communities to fund, build, and protect what matters.

## Stylus Agent
- Create an Agent that assists with onboarding to Arbitrum Stylus Rust contract development.
- Source stylus contract examples & fine tune or prompt engineer an AI model.
- Create a way to deploy stylus contracts through the UI or through the agent.
- Create a server that can compile and deploy Stylus smart contracts.  Expose through API endpoints.
data.title: Arbitrum Stylus Contract Development Agent

data.reason:
# Bringing Smart Tokens to Arbitrum
August's focus was integrating TokenScript ERC-5169 into Web3GPT. This enables Arbitrum users to build and deploy Smart Tokens (NFT contracts with additional XML/JS code that adds interactivity to each token).

We have been working with [SmartLayer](https://www.smartlayer.network/) over the summer to add TokenScript to Web3GPT, and are proud to announce the integration is [LIVE!](https://web3gpt.app/?a=asst_13kX3wWTUa7Gz9jvFOqnnA77)

The TokenScript framework let’s you bring context, security and cross-platform functionality to your tokens with a single XML/JS file. Run your tokens as native, modular ‘mini-Dapps’ in user wallets.

This allows for building functionality directly into NFT's themselves for example minting, gamification, listing which can then be easily integrated into dapps or wallet interfaces without additional development work.

[Smart Token Tokenscript Viewer](https://viewer.tokenscript.org/) 
![Tokenscript Viewer](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202024-09-02%20at%209.36.40%E2%80%AFAM-y4eEQpsWu16rfAeLxndg0N6k5rumGt.png)

[Try TokenScript Agent](https://web3gpt.app/?a=asst_13kX3wWTUa7Gz9jvFOqnnA77)

![TokenScript Agent](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202024-09-02%20at%209.38.18%E2%80%AFAM-u2kOuCQknuXMkvBx9OfDAgPJQg36J1.png)

### Demo Example
Follow our example deployment, where we deployed an interactive Arbitrum Cats NFT using the TokenScript Agent. 

- [Arbitrum Cats Web3GPT](https://web3gpt.app/share/thread_B1kgHImrucg6gKFV9Qy8YlkZ)

# Demo Video

data.description:
## Agents & Sharing

Build the Agent Explorer - a UI for exploring Agents created by the community.

### Additional Tasks

- Add tools to Agents.
- PR template for community built Agent Tool executions.

## Transaction Building

Add transaction building, readonly for MVP.

Query onchain data with natural language!  Get ABI from block explorer or build ABI dynamically using Viem.
data.title: Agents, Sharing, Transactions

data.reason:
**Launched Tools for New Agents**

All new agents created from the agent creator have the ability to deploy contracts

[New Solidity CTF Agent](https://youtu.be/l6NQr8sG7Y0?si=xmIr1pD1MuN-Tq3V)

Codebase improvements and refactors made.  

- api routes -> server actions
- fixed / removed rerender issues in Chat

https://github.com/Markeljan/web3gpt/commit/1b00c23712d044986c0e3835947fed3c72fe3783

Transaction building tools deprioritized in favor of Agent creator improvements.

Codebase improvements and refactors made.  

- api routes -> server actions
- fixed / removed rerender issues in Chat

https://github.com/Markeljan/web3gpt/commit/1b00c23712d044986c0e3835947fed3c72fe3783

Transaction building tools deprioritized in favor of Agent creator improvements.

data.description:
- Migrate to OpenAI Assistants API, update to latest Vercel AI SDK.
- Create Agent registry & UI.
- Allow users to create, and share custom agents.
- TokenScript integration with Smart Token labs.
- External API for other apps to trigger contract deployments.
data.title: Create your own Agents, Assistants API.

data.reason: Verifying as the contributor. Source code proof: https://github.com/markeljan/web3gpt

# Successfully migrated / updated to Assistants API!

Now using the latest Assitants API and Vercel AI SDK.
[Github](https://github.com/markeljan/web3-gpt)


# Launched Assistant Creator

[Create and share an AI Assistant in minutes!](https://w3gpt.ai/?a=asst_q1i7mHlBuAbDSrpDQk9f3Egm)

# Tokenscript Integration

W3GPT is proud to announce our first major integration!!  Smart Layer implemented a TokenScript Agent using W3GPT to deploy ERC5169 NFT's with AI!  

[Announcement Link](https://x.com/SmartLayer/status/1793166285054107766) 500k followers!! 😵‍💫🚀

# External API WIP

Began working with Sean from ORIGIN STORY team to deploy contracts through a developer SDK / API

# Successfully migrated / updated to Assistants API!

Now using the latest Assitants API and Vercel AI SDK.
[Github](https://github.com/markeljan/web3-gpt)


# Launched Assistant Creator

[Create and share an AI Assistant in minutes!](https://w3gpt.ai/?a=asst_q1i7mHlBuAbDSrpDQk9f3Egm)

# Tokenscript Integration

W3GPT is proud to announce our first major integration!!  Smart Layer implemented a TokenScript Agent using W3GPT to deploy ERC5169 NFT's with AI!  

[Announcement Link](https://x.com/SmartLayer/status/1793166285054107766) 500k followers!! 😵‍💫🚀

# External API WIP

Began working with Sean from ORIGIN STORY team to deploy contracts through a developer SDK / API
Verifying as the contributor. Source code proof: https://github.com/markeljan/web3gpt

data.text:
# Tokenscript Integration

August's focus was integrating **TokenScript ERC-5169** into Web3GPT.  This enables Arbitrum users to build and deploy **Smart Tokens** (NFT contracts with additional XML/JS code that adds interactivity to each token).

The TokenScript framework let’s you bring context, security and cross-platform functionality to your tokens with a single XML/JS file. Run your tokens as native, modular ‘mini-Dapps’ in user wallets.

This allows for building functionality directly into NFT's themselves for example **minting**, **gamification**, **listing** which can then be easily integrated into dapps or wallet interfaces without additional development work.

[Smart Token Tokenscript Viewer](https://viewer.tokenscript.org/)
![TokenScript Viewer](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202024-09-02%20at%209.36.40%E2%80%AFAM-y4eEQpsWu16rfAeLxndg0N6k5rumGt.png)

[Try Tokenscript Agent](https://web3gpt.app/?a=asst_13kX3wWTUa7Gz9jvFOqnnA77
) 
![Smart Token Agent](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202024-09-02%20at%209.38.18%E2%80%AFAM-u2kOuCQknuXMkvBx9OfDAgPJQg36J1.png)

Example TokenScript Deployment
https://web3gpt.app/share/thread_uLXiHKvrzqI0y9oTuSsMO3QS
data.title: TokenScript Smart Token Integration

data.text:
## W3GPT is a finalist in Backdrop Build V4!!  

![Build V4 Finalist](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/build-v4-finalist-2aeMlhVIdA9TeMy6ve899iObwA0mMA.png)

### [Finalist Announcement Tweet](https://x.com/withBackdrop/status/1798367806313865427)

## Added Agent Creator 

Agent Creator helps you build your own custom AI Agents that can be used on W3GPT or any OpenAI Assistants API enabled platform (including our telegram integration with @bun_ai_bot)

### [New Agent Creator Demo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIaFdsn9_IM)
data.title: Backdrop Build V4 Finalist

data.name: Gitcoin
data.description: Gitcoin creates solutions that empower digitally native communities to fund, build, and protect what matters.

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the advancement of the Arbitrum ecosystem?

Describe your previous work or plans related to the Arbitrum ecosystem. How does your project strengthen Arbitrum's foundational infrastructure, improve developer efficiency, or accelerate the adoption of novel applications?
questions.explanation: Web3GPT strengthens Arbitrum's ecosystem by streamlining smart contract development and deployment on the network. It improves developer efficiency through AI-powered code generation and one-click deployment, reducing the time and technical knowledge required to build on Arbitrum. By lowering entry barriers, Web3GPT accelerates the adoption of novel applications, attracting a broader range of developers and innovators to create diverse projects on the Arbitrum platform.

questions.query: If applicable, describe how your project leverages Stylus or Arbitrum Orbit Chains. What unique capabilities or use cases does this enable?
questions.explanation: Web3GPT supports creation of custom AI Agents for smart contract development.  Currently, Solidity contracts and deployments to Arbitrum Sepolia are supported, however we are actively building an Agent for Stylus.  This agent will support generating Stylus Rust contracts, converting Solidity -> Rust contracts, and deploying Stylus Rust contracts all from within the Web3GPT UI.

questions.query: Describe your team's expertise in your chosen focus area within the Arbitrum ecosystem. Include relevant experience, publications, or past projects.
questions.explanation: We are experienced in integrating smart contract development languages beyond Solidity, for example we built https://stx.fun which writes Clarity smart contracts and deploys them to Stacks Nakamoto Testnet.

questions.query: List any contract addresses with the associated network(s), EOAs, or deployer addresses your project has deployed.
Have you received any previous grants or support for your work in the Arbitrum ecosystem? If so, please provide details and estimated funding amounts.
Would you like to share anything else about your project, team, or vision for the Arbitrum ecosystem that wasn't covered in the previous questions?

data.title: GG22 OSS - Developer Tooling and Libraries

questions.query: Project GitHub Repo
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?
questions.explanation: Web3GPT is a chat-based tool that integrates Large Language Models and AI Agents to simplify smart contract development. It addresses the complexity and high barriers in deploying and managing smart contracts on EVM-compatible blockchains by offering an intuitive chat interface for deployment, interaction, and testing without requiring deep Web3 expertise.

questions.query: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.
questions.explanation: Web3GPT lowers development barriers by enabling wallet-less interactions through account abstraction, allowing users to engage with blockchains without a dedicated Web3 wallet. It improves efficiency by allowing seamless contract deployment and management directly from the chat interface. Additionally, the upcoming automated testing feature will help ensure contract integrity post-deployment, reducing the time and effort needed for manual testing and minimizing potential errors.

questions.query: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.
questions.explanation: Web3GPT is gaining traction in the developer community with over 70 GitHub stars and 30+ forks. We have more than 1,100 unique monthly users and handle over 50 contract deployments each month. Users actively engage with the platform through our live demo at https://web3gpt.app, providing valuable feedback that helps us continuously improve. The growing number of users and active community support show that Web3GPT is effectively making smart contract development easier.

questions.query: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.
questions.explanation: Our roadmap focuses on keeping Web3GPT 100% free and open source while utilizing the best available models. We plan to upgrade to the o1-preview model from the current GPT-4o to enhance performance and manage costs effectively. Additionally, we aim to enable multiple providers to offer more flexibility and reliability. Grant funds will be used to cover infrastructure costs, including RPC providers, and to support the upgrade and integration of advanced models. To onboard more developers, we will incentivize contract deployments and on-chain transactions through sponsored AI transactions and deployments. This approach will foster a vibrant developer community and accelerate the adoption of Web3GPT.

questions.query: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

data.name: Gitcoin
data.description: Gitcoin creates solutions that empower digitally native communities to fund, build, and protect what matters.

data.title: GG23 OSS - Developer Tooling and Libraries

questions.query: Email Address
Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Project GitHub Repo
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds
Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?
questions.explanation: Web3GPT is an AI-powered platform simplifying smart contract development and deployment across multiple EVM chains. It eliminates the complexity of Solidity coding, IDE setup, and manual contract verification. Developers of all skill levels can generate, deploy, and verify contracts through natural language prompts. Over 250 AI-generated contracts have already been deployed and auto-verified, addressing inefficiencies in onboarding, development speed, and multi-chain deployments.

questions.query: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.
questions.explanation:
Reduces technical barriers by enabling contract creation via natural language, removing the need for Solidity expertise.
Increases deployment efficiency with automated verification and IPFS upload.
Supports major EVM testnets (Sepolia, Arbitrum, Optimism, Base, Polygon, etc.).
Provides specialized AI agents (e.g., OpenZeppelin 5.0, CTF Agent) that enforce security best practices and help identify vulnerabilities.
Metrics: 276+ smart contract deployments, 650% increase in page views (50,653 views), 17,422 visitors.

questions.query: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.
questions.explanation:
276 smart contracts deployed and verified across multiple EVM chains.
200+ monthly active users (chatting and connected with Github)
17,422 unique visitors, 50,653 page views over the past year.
1.2K+ referrals from GitHub, indicating strong developer interest.
Community engagement across India, USA, and Philippines, with 63% desktop and 36% mobile users.
Integration with Blockscout, IPFS, and OpenZeppelin showing adoption of widely respected Web3 standards.

questions.query: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.
questions.explanation:
Roadmap:

Q2 2025: Build APIs for developers and AI Agents to deploy smart contracts via MCP, Eliza, and Goat SDK standards.
Q2-Q3 2025: Launch Web3GPT Agent tools enabling:
Deployment of Web3 agents to Telegram.
On-chain tool integrations.
Cross-framework contract deployments via external agents.
Q3 2025: Hire a dedicated community manager for social media, developer outreach, onboarding, and technical support (actively hiring).
Throughout 2025: Scale infra and cover monthly $250+ costs for inference, hosting, and blockchain interaction.

questions.query: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]—for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

data.title: Proof of Ship - Season 3
data.description:
**Add CELO to **Web3GPT!****

- add Celo wallet connect, enable contract deploying
- add Celo Agent deployments ( deploy contracts from agent wallet)
- Automatic Blockscout / explorer verification for deployed contracts
- Fun new bonus feature for Celo?

milestones.description: - Connect, deploy contracts, use agent to deploy on Celo testnet.

milestones.title: Blockscout verification
milestones.description: Add automatic blockscout contract verification for contracts deployed on web3gpt.ai

data.title: Blockscout verification
data.description: Add automatic blockscout contract verification for contracts deployed on web3gpt.ai

data.reason: ## MILESTONE 2: Blockscout Verification **Dates**: Apr 09, 2025 - Apr 10, 2025 **Status**: Completed **Description**: Add automatic Blockscout contract verification for contracts deployed on web3gpt.ai. Contracts deployed on Celo with Web3GPT are now automatically verified using Blockscout, streamlining the process and ensuring transparent smart contract source code for developers and users. ### Deployed [CeloGrow contract](https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0xc6CaD65eF4DEc11FDea3F39a4793Ad6a717cdEcF?tab=contract) Auto-verified contract: ### Additonal deployments

## MILESTONE 2: Blockscout Verification **Dates**: Apr 09, 2025 - Apr 10, 2025 **Status**: Completed **Description**: Add automatic Blockscout contract verification for contracts deployed on web3gpt.ai. Contracts deployed on Celo with Web3GPT are now automatically verified using Blockscout, streamlining the process and ensuring transparent smart contract source code for developers and users. ### Deployed [CeloGrow contract](https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0xc6CaD65eF4DEc11FDea3F39a4793Ad6a717cdEcF?tab=contract) Auto-verified contract: ### Additonal deployments

data.reason: ## MILESTONE 1: Add Celo Network **Dates**: Apr 10, 2025 - Apr 17, 2025 **Status**: Completed **Description**: Connect, deploy contracts, and use an agent to deploy on the Celo testnet. ### Celo Alfajores Testnet added to W3GPT! ### Prompting to make a ReFi token contract ### Generated Smart contract ### Deployment result (IPFS + published on blockscout) ### IPFS repository made up of all contract dependencies ### Deployed [CeloGrow contract](https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0xc6CaD65eF4DEc11FDea3F39a4793Ad6a717cdEcF?tab=contract)

## MILESTONE 1: Add Celo Network **Dates**: Apr 10, 2025 - Apr 17, 2025 **Status**: Completed **Description**: Connect, deploy contracts, and use an agent to deploy on the Celo testnet. ### Celo Alfajores Testnet added to W3GPT! ### Prompting to make a ReFi token contract ### Generated Smart contract ### Deployment result (IPFS + published on blockscout) ### IPFS repository made up of all contract dependencies ### Deployed [CeloGrow contract](https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0xc6CaD65eF4DEc11FDea3F39a4793Ad6a717cdEcF?tab=contract)

data.text:
Hey builders!

We've whipped up a fun little AI agent to showcase deploying contracts on Celo Alfajores testnet.

This agent walks you through deploying and configuring "Chainable" contracts that can be linked together once deployed.

✨ **Try the Agent:** [https://w3gpt.ai?a=asst_e7IDtl1kaU664OFHzfIRvVkN](https://w3gpt.ai?a=asst_e7IDtl1kaU664OFHzfIRvVkN)

![image](https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202025-04-15%20at%207.04.17%E2%80%AFPM-iVTs4Mp6cwIPMERdHt3nGB3G2P6lRn.png)

📊 **Testnet Deployment Activity (Tx Log on Blockscout):** [https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0x42e9c498135431a48796B5fFe2CBC3d7A1811927?tab=txs](https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0x42e9c498135431a48796B5fFe2CBC3d7A1811927?tab=txs)

https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202025-04-15%20at%207.07.03%E2%80%AFPM-tnak2Y9HxzGTteRKnXHCb9wYjclckN.png

📄 **Contract Repository (IPFS):** [https://ipfs.w3gpt.ai/ipfs/bafybeiaibrx6vs7fjp2kezrafmnqosm3ds57g436hw5kalkdignjrj62y4/](https://ipfs.w3gpt.ai/ipfs/bafybeiaibrx6vs7fjp2kezrafmnqosm3ds57g436hw5kalkdignjrj62y4/)

Heads up – this is just **one example** of a Celo agent! The cool part is that anyone can easily craft and deploy their own custom agents for different Celo tasks by talking with the [agent creator](http://localhost:3000?a=asst_q1i7mHlBuAbDSrpDQk9f3Egm).

\#Celo #Alfajores #Web3 #AI #DevTools #BuildOnCelo #IPFS

We've whipped up a fun little AI agent to showcase deploying contracts on Celo Alfajores testnet. This agent walks you through deploying and configuring "Chainable" contracts that can be linked together once deployed. ✨ Try the Agent: https://w3gpt.ai?a=asst_e7IDtl1kaU664OFHzfIRvVkN image 📊 Testnet Deployment Activity (Tx Log on Blockscout): https://celo-alfajores.blockscout.com/address/0x42e9c498135431a48796B5fFe2CBC3d7A1811927?tab=txs https://lvjt7wkmlmpwhrpm.public.blob.vercel-storage.com/Screenshot%202025-04-15%20at%207.07.03%E2%80%AFPM-tnak2Y9HxzGTteRKnXHCb9wYjclckN.png 📄 Contract Repository (IPFS): https://ipfs.w3gpt.ai/ipfs/bafybeiaibrx6vs7fjp2kezrafmnqosm3ds57g436hw5kalkdignjrj62y4/ Heads up – this is just one example of a Celo agent!
